title: Angular/Polygonal sans-serif (Stadtkulturfestival - autobahn.nl)
content:
Font used on this poster by Autobahn.nl for the Stadtkulturfestival by mittebitte.nl. Could be (surely?) a custom work but as far as I donâ€™t understand any Dutch... So any suggestion for similars would be appreciated. Thanks.  
 [http://www.autobahnontwerpers.nl/grafisch\_ontwerp/detailpagina.php?id=7](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110328/http:/www.autobahnontwerpers.nl/grafisch_ontwerp/detailpagina.php?id=7)  
 [Uitingen: logo, poster, flyer, programmafolder, sticker, grote buitenbanner en twee kleine banners die niet bedrukt zijn, maar ook handmatig voorzien van typografie](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110328/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Uitingen%25253A%252Blogo%25252C%252Bposter%25252C%252Bflyer%25252C%252Bprogrammafolder%25252C%252Bsticker%25252C%252Bgrote%252Bbuitenbanner%252Ben%252Btwee%252Bkleine%252Bbanners%252Bdie%252Bniet%252Bbedrukt%252Bzijn%25252C%252Bmaar%252Book%252Bhandmatig%252Bvoorzien%252Bvan%252Btypografie)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110328im_/http:/typophile.com/files/869011226952716_3923.jpg)
author: Ryuk

comments.content: Perfect! Thanks both of you for taking time to answer.
